name: Asteroids (itch) (Techno Cuber)
description:
Note: I posted the main.py file separately in case you want to play around with the settings.

 I recreated a terrible version of Asteroids that's buggy but it could be fun. I honestly didn't put much effort into this, but I did add some sound effects and it is replay able. The asteroids do glitch every now and then, and the player isn't centered, but I'd say it's a decent recreation and it was mainly made for educational purposes, so just have fun!
